titles.title: SBA Loan Paperwork Reduction Act of 2012
To amend the Small Business Act to make permanent the Small Loan Advantage program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: 1/27/2012--Introduced. SBA Loan Paperwork Reduction Act of 2012 - Directs the Administrator of the Small Business Administration (SBA) to carry out a Small Loan Advantage Program in the same manner as, and as a replacement for, the SBA Small Loan Advantage loan initiative. (Under the loan initiative, SBA lenders make partially guaranteed, lower-dollar small business loans which often benefit businesses in underserved areas or markets.) Makes pilot program loan guarantee percentage limits inapplicable to the Small Loan Advantage Program.
